description.oldValue:
Results from remote repositories indexed with Microsoft Graph connectors will be displayed in the 'All' vertical in Microsoft Bing (when signed in with a work or school account) alongside information from Microsoft 365 apps and services.
GA date: March CY2023
description.newValue: Results from remote repositories indexed with Microsoft Graph connectors will be displayed in the 'All' vertical in Microsoft Bing (when signed in with a work or school account) alongside information from Microsoft 365 apps and services.
